channel.title: Posts on Ivan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ivan's blog

item.title: What is this blog ?
item.description: What is this blog ? This is a blog about my journey in the world of programming. I will try to write about my projects, my learnings and my thoughts. I hope you will enjoy it. What is this blog made of ? This blog is made with Hugo, a static site generator. The theme is PaperMod, a theme made by adityatelange. The source code of this blog is available on Github.
